hero.h2: I am a Jr Full Stack Developer
hero.p2: I am specializing in Javascript, React.js, Node.js, REST API, Tailwind CSS. I am currently focused on building MERN Stack Projects. My next goal is to learn and develop React Native Apps. I am passionate about solving problems and I definitely do it in a practical and creative way. The most I love about my job is the satisfaction once I figured out the challenging problems that I encounter.

footer: Created by myself with React and Tailwind
